Cindercinthesis

Photography Writing Music Drawing

Cindercinthesis is an award winning photographer and videographer in New York City and beyond.

He spent four years living in Nashville, where he served as the Creative Media Director at Lights on the Lawn, Nashville's flagship charity concert, and as the Photography Director at the Vanderbilt Hustler, the student newspaper of his alma mater. During that time he covered a variety of shows for his outlet, and collaborated with numerous artists during their stops in Nashville. In addition to his own creative work, he has led teams that have won numerous awards for their coverage packages during his time in Nashville.

After graduating and moving to NYC, Josh now works at Microsoft in the city, on a product designed to enable project coordination and collaboration at every level. He has continued working in creative media, collaborating with artists visiting NYC to document their shows, as well as traveling nationwide to provide his services wherever needed.

Josh's work has been recognized by artists, outlets, and award organizations as high-quality. Artists at every level have used his photographs and video for promotional materials, social media. News outlets such as the Associated Press, TIME Magazine, and NBC have published his content in print, online, and on TV segments.

Josh is available for hire for media coverage of concerts, festivals, and tours, as well as sports and other creative projects. Reach out via phone or email and he will be in touch to discuss.

Email: josh@rehders.photos
